item.title: [dmc] Maelstrom Nexus
item.description:
Enchantment

The first spell you cast each turn has cascade. (When you cast your first spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

item.title: [dmu] Golden Argosy
item.description:
Legendary Artifact — Vehicle

Whenever Golden Argosy attacks, exile each creature that crewed it this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

item.title: [dmu] Orca, Siege Demon
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Trample

When Orca dies, it deals damage equal to its power divided as you choose among any number of targets.

Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

item.title: [dmu] Radha's Firebrand
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever Radha's Firebrand attacks, target creature defending player controls with power less than Radha's Firebrand's power can't block this turn.

item.title: [dmc] Rohgahh, Kher Keep Overlord
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Kobold Warrior

Other Kobolds you control get +2/+2.

Whenever you cast a Kobold spell, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

Whenever you cast a Dragon spell, create a 0/1 red Kobold creature token named Kobolds of Kher Keep.

item.title: [dmu] Sphinx of Clear Skies
item.description:
Creature — Sphinx

Flying, ward {2}

Domain — Whenever Sphinx of Clear Skies deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

https://www.nme.com/news/gaming-news/heres-two-exclusive-magic-the-gathering-cards-from-dominaria-united-3292770

{3}{B}, {T}: Each opponent discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
